ComicInfo.Title: Amnia Cycle; Sagittarius A*; The Adventures of Lucy and Friends
ComicInfo.Summary:
The city of Zoohurst is the pinnacle of architectural ambition, the spirit of the Shadow Zone, and the home of Shana Tyson, whose name was uttered on a mysterious transmission in the deep of space. Zoohurst is also Tara's next destination in her search for Amnia. But the massive animal buildings of Zoohurst are not the only architectural wonders to behold in this issue. In a collaboration between father and daughter, DUSTIN & LUCY WEAVER bring you “The Adventures of Lucy and Friends” where a group of friends visit the very strange Wing Store.
ContentsTable of ContentsAmnia Cycle (Chapter 4)Sagittarius A* (# 5)About PaklisThe Adventures of Lucy and Friends*Guest Artist Pin-up [by Ben Sears]Next IssueNote: "The Adventures of Lucy and Friends" is co-written and co-created by Dustin Weaver and his 2-year old daughter, Lucy Fitzgerald Weaver. ;)
